买bug送游戏名不虚传。bug层出不穷，从来不修，游戏特色。
我是冲着护士的难练和强大才买游戏的，改版后的护士，真如拒绝所说的那样，就是一个塞子，毫无手感可言，对萌新极其不友好，遇上车队更是经常被手电嘲讽、当面拆钩，最后屠夫沦为陪练。再看看那两个红配的效果，真的不是用屁股想出来的？以前我用无配玩，不论技术如何，至少手感非常好，那时候用无配真能练技术，现在带双充能都赶不上以前无配的速度，带无配更是被马拉松一整局，让我怎么打？一削就削到底，这就是zzz
最后总结一句：游戏是真的好玩，但zzz是真的垃圾

Dead by Daylight has a great overall design, but the experience itself can be very stressing, problems like the incompetent developers, unfun gameplay features to play against and toxic community will haunt you every match, but the eventual pleasure of escaping a tight match against a great killer or finally managing to kill a solid survivor will get you addicted to this very intense and troublesome game.

Not to be a downer since this game is a cool concept, but despite being a "casual" game it's designed very much as a competitive game and most players treat it as such. This lead to the development of "meta's" by the player base which are more or less designed to be the most effective at the cost of take fun from the other side, be it from survivor or killer, and having to be on the receiving end of these builds is angering to say the least.

This isn't even touching upon the downright bullying nature that some players have, that's not to say every match will have someone BM'ing, or going onto your profile to write rude comments targeting you for playing X character or using X perk, but it's frequent enough that enjoyment of this game will quickly wear off and you will soon find it a chore picking it up for long periods of time as to avoid this sort of behavior.
I like this game. Play both sides

es un juego muy injusto emparejan killer de rank 20 con supervivientes de rank 1,2,3,4 y viceversa. ademas si no tienes buena señal el juego te desconecta y te penaliza en mi caso asta 5 o 6 horas sin poder jugar te descuentan puntos aun si estabas a punto de matar al ultimo superviviente. por otro lado la comunidad es toxica en especial los supervivientes, que si los matas eres un hdp. que si no los matas eres un manco, por otro lado me paso varias veces que me segaban con la linterna y me quedaba asi toda la partida sin poder ver, ademas los supervivientes hay muchos grupos que estan comunicados entre si cuando esto que yo tenga entendido no esta permitido. y muchas cosas mas. y he publicado esto por que me han tenido todo el dia jugando con equipos de rank 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 y ademas premades cuando yo apenas soy rank 13 y ya me canse y publico esto por rabia.
HOW DARE YOU!?

Game feels like a money grab with too much paid content locked behind the original price tag of the game. If you're gonna play with friends or have no friends and want to stalk other groups and goof around this game is cool for a while. But i can safely say with 500 hours, if you are going to get too competitive or just play too much in general there are many better options out there.

I have grinded this game for hours this season and I have enjoyed playing it 50% plus of the time, but 30% of it has been toxic and awful. I want the devs to see and understand that this game needs to be fixed a bit and that it needs to add in and do a few things for these fixes. The point I want to make is I have gone all the way from rank 18 at the start of the season to rank 10 which I have never done before and I have learned to properly loop myer's, nurses, hillbillies,trapers, lesion and the plague. What is broken in the killers is the doctor, freddy cougar and leatherface. I just had a match on the day I posted this were a freddy cougar put down a blood spot and I never even set foot on it as my feet were next to it but not on it and the game registered as such and the freddy cougar killer ended up killing all my teamates in 1 minute with me juking him twice and almost a third. There is no way that is legit and the blood puddles need to have a fixed range and not be slightly broken. For doctor they need to hard nerf his charge cause the range is broken and the time it takes to snap out is also broken. They need to fix the leather face's range on his chain saw so that it doesn't glitch over someone already having vaulted a wall and still hit them when its out of range. They need to remove the clown as its not strong but just unbalanced and toxic to play against in any facet. They need to also put freddy cougars dream state back to an ability that he calls upon with his gen teleportation so he can be more balanced as killers would then have to run good perks on him rather then just 3 lvl 1 green perks and bbq and chilli to get an easy win. I am excited they are adding a ranged killer and hope it is solid. Besides that I think they should add one more perk to survivors to balance the game and buff any killers I said don't need a nerf besides pig. I think that the macarbee's required to remove the headgear is a bit broke but doable and I think that setting it back to a constant #3 is fair. Pig is debatable. I would also like to add that the game did a good job making it a bit more fair for killers. But I would like to add on a final note that matchmaking needs to be fixed so that a rank 10 survivor gets placed with other survivors from rank 8-12 unless you are in a 4 stack that has a long unbalanced range of survivors and that you should be placed against a killer who is rank 12-14 so that it fixes queue time to being shorter and also balances the game since killer rank is always going to be slightly higher than survivor rank based off of the fact that it is 1 v 4 and that a killer is always gonna be a bit behind due to map size. I would like to add the function of allowing 5 survivor teams now and adding up to a 6 gen requirement with 2 - 1 more gens per map so that killers can't play linear and camp the last 2 -3 gens if they spawn next to one another. I would say that they need to allow hatch to spawn after 5 gen completion if their were 5 survivors and you started with 6 gens so that the key has value and use and that it doesn't get broken in-game where if they close the hatch you can't reopen it. On a final note I would say that they need to increase the amount of blood points people get so they can level up quicker on survivor or killer so they can learn the game a bit faster and get a bit better handle on proper builds and enjoy the game more. I have fully loved and enjoyed this game so far. But adding these fixes would balance the game more. And matchmaking with only 2 rank difference when you solo queue would be beautiful and a 2-4 rank difference lower than your rank for killer would be great because then killers can face a more skilled lobby and learn more and get into matches way faster since there are almost no people rank 18-20 who don't queue with 1-3 friends making it such that they will have someone rank 15 and above in their party for learning purposes meaning that a rank 18-20 killer who can play well on one killer has to wait 5-10 minutes plus just to find one match and can never rank up enough to find matches quick enough so they can rank up and get decent or good with killer, since dead by daylight is a game based off of one friends convincing other friends to get into the game meaning you rarely have rank 17-20 lobbies with all 4 people being rank 17 or less anymore since the game has been out so long. As I have bought the game for one friend and he enjoyed it and was playing in a lobby as a lower rank 17 with only one person being rank 16 and me and another friend being rank 10 or higher. Thank you and hopefully you can add these fixes and new stuff to keep the game interesting for everyone and good night to the devs. Love this game;.

Okay so as you can tell i play this game just a little bit 100 Hours, (At the time Probably more by now).
and let me just say This game is amazing, sure it has its ups and downs as all games do, But trust me if your worried about getting this game don't,The game is just pure fun. Playing with friends matters Though so get a few friends to get it too.

Just watch out for Doctor, Ghost Face, Leather Face, The Shape, And Just every killer that comes your way.

Again Play with friends Or this game might get boring quick unless, You wanna play killer then that is a ton of fun. :P      

Or if you did not care about a single thing i said then just get it anyway.
